contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Transportation     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Transportation      Transportation   Main Menu    Buses    Paratransit           Cancellations and No-Shows    Coverage Area and Hours         Night Ride           Coverage Area    Code of Conduct    Setting up and using a TransLōc Account    Night Ride Trip Feedback         Abandoned Bikes    Vehicles           CARS    Chauffeur Service         Moving Service     Eyebrow menu    Administrative Services    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Transportation    Vehicles    Chauffeur Service        Chauffeur Service   The UIC Transportation department offers premium interdepartmental Chauffeur services that can be utilized by campus units and organizations 365 days a year.  Our services range from sedan service for small groups and individuals to campus tours and specialized, multi-bus trips to points of interest across Illinois and beyond.  Let our professional University Drivers provide you with a safe, prompt, and budget friendly experience on your next campus excursion!      We offer:    ADA accessible equipment  37 Passenger buses  24/25 passenger mini-buses  12 & 15 passenger vans  Suburbans  Minivans  Paratransit units  Sedans    You may book the Chauffeur service by establishing a service request in the FM system.  Estimate requests can be submitted using the form below.  You may also request an estimate by contacting rides@uic.edu and providing:    Department name  Contact phone #  Date and Time for requested service(s)  All pick-up and drop-off parameters  Number of passengers  Equipment preferences    Please call UIC Dispatch at (312) 99 6-2842 with any questions.     Name * Required    First     Last   Department * Required Building * Required Valid Email * Required   Phone * Required Name of Site Contact * Required    First     Last   Cell Number for Site Contact * Required Date Request Submitted - must be mm/dd/yyyy format * Required   Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY   Date of Chauffeur Service - must be mm/dd/yyyy format * Required   Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY   Multiple Days Required? * Required Yes No Number of Passengers * Required Vehicle Type * Required   Sedan    15 Passenger Van    25 Passenger Bus    Full Size Bus    Paratransit Vehicle    Special Equipment Considerations    Other  Description of Service (Locations, Pickup/Return times) * Required Assisted/ Accessible Boarding Required? * Required Yes No Unknown Please List Any Special Circumstances Phone This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
